      • getMines

        public int getMines()
        Returns:
        number of mines

      • createGame

        public char[][] createGame()
        Creates a new game or actually a gameboard
        Returns:
        returns a String-matrix where the mines are stars and numbers for the other squares depending on how many mines that are aroung (0 means empty sqaure)

      • placeMines

        protected int[][] placeMines()
        Genetates a matrix containing the coordinates for the mines by help of a randomizer. A mine is placed in the numbermatrix, if the original number is replaced by zero.
        Returns:
        a matrix containg all the coordinates for the mines

      • indexOutsideMatrix

        public boolean indexOutsideMatrix(int i,
                         int j)
        Checks if the coordinate (i,j) is in the matrix
        Parameters:
        i - row-index
        j - column-index
        Returns:
        returns true if (i,j) is outside the matrix, otherwise false

      • countMines

        protected int countMines(char[][] matrix,
             int r,
             int c)
        Counts how many mines that are placed around a specific square
        Parameters:
        matrix - the matrix that is checks
        r - the square's row-coordinate
        c - the square's column-coordinate
        Returns:
        returns how many mines that are around the square, a number between 0 and 8
